price: Tí Ó bá fẹ́, Ó máa mu yín kúrò lórí ilẹ̀. Ó sì máa mú ẹ̀dá titun wá.
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ وَيَأۡتِ بِخَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayati bikhalqin jadīdin
